name: Skipper and Scooter Matching Outfits
description:
Skipper and Scooter - Mix and Match outfits

Red, black and white with a Scotty Dog theme.

5 pieces:

GRANNY GOWN - Long sleeved, full length with sleeves and neckline trimmed in gathered lace.  Bodice in black with white pin dot cotton.  Skirt in a Scotty dog print with bias gingham trim at hemline.  Snap closures in the back.

SHAWL - in same Scotty dog print with red fringe trim.  Fastens around shoulder with a snap.

SLACKS - basic, straight leg in black cotton.  With snap closure.

TOP - in red cotton knit with applied white guipure butterfly.

HAT - floppy hat crocheted in white cotton.

You can also find me on ebay.com. User name: evansrogers
Check my feedback and completed listings.

DOLLS NOT INCLUDED

name: Francie - Sissy Suits - Reproduction and Color Variation
description:
Reproduction and color variation of an early Francie outfit called Sissy Suits from 1969.  

JACKET – short jacket in turquoise cotton.   Gathered lace trimmed cuffs.  3 gold buttons with snap closures.  With an exclusive Martha' Miniature Workshop tag.

SKIRT - matching turquoise cotton.  Deep front pleat with small side pleats.  Patch pockets with gold buttons.  Snap closures in the back.

BLOUSE - white cotton, sleeveless blouse with lace trim and 3 pink buttons and snap closure.

BELT - yellow vinyl with pink ribbon accent.  Gold belt buckle.

KNEE SOCKS - in pink knit.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

You can also find me on ebay.com.  User name:  evansrogers
Check my feedback and completed listings.

name: Barbie Hostess Outfit Japanese Reproduction
description:
Japan Reproduction - Barbie and Silkstone Barbie

3 Piece Brocade
Reproduction

Reproduction of a hostess outfit created exclusively for the Japanese market in the 1960s.    Classic styling as seen on page 44-45 in the wonderful and not to be missed book:  Barbie in Japan by Keiko Kimura Shibano. 

This auction includes 3 wonderful pieces:

Hostess Pajama – one-piece in a luxurious silk brocade of green and metallic gold.  Snap closures in the back.

Skirt – full length in matching silk brocade and lined with a gold satin taffeta.  Wide waist band in fuchsia taffeta.  Snap closures in the back.

Shawl -  in matching brocade and lined with gold satin.  Hand finished with an exclusive Martha's Miniature Workshop tag.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Poodle Doodles
description:
REPRODUCTION of Barbie’s outfit called Poodle Doodles from the Put-Ons ‘N Pets series, created in 1972.  

Includes the following 5 pieces: 

•     DRESS – red cotton knit top and multicolored floral rayon skirt.  Snap closures in the back.   
•     VEST – in same floral print with blue ultrasuede collar and waistband.  Closes with button.  Hand finished with an exclusive marthas miniature workshop tag.
•     BOOTS– in same floral print.
•     DOG COLLAR with LEASH – blue ultrasuede collar with 2 ring closures, gold chain and suede hand grip.

Go to Contact page to request more photos.

Doll and Dog not Included.

name: Hair Happenin's Barbie - Repro Original Outfit
description:
Barbie

Hair Happenin’s Barbie – Original Outfit - REPRO

REPRODUCTION

This is a reproduction of the very hard to find, Hair Happenin’s Barbie’s original outfit from 1971.   Two pieces:

DRESS – White cotton top with fushia pink taffeta skirt.  Elastic casings at the neckline, elastic gathered sleeves and elastic gathered waist.  Full gathered ruffle at hemline.  Snap closures in the back.  Finished by hand with an exclusive Martha’s Miniature Workshop tag. 

BELT – black utlrasuede belt with bead closure.

name: Barbie GAY PARISIENNE Reproduction and Color Variation
description:
GAY PARISIENNE
Reproduction
Color Variation
BARBIE

OOAK reproduction and color variation of one of Barbie’s most coveted outfits from 1959 called Gay Parisienne.

Another top quality creation from Martha’s Miniature Workshop.  

•	Bubble Dress – Fashioned from a dusty turquoise pindot.   Taffeta and organdy bows at front hemline and back.  Snap closures in the back.  

•	Headpiece – flexible grosgrain ribbon band finished with fine navy blue tulle and bead trim.  

•	Stole – white faux fur with snap closure.

•	Clutch Bag – pink velvet with pink silk lining and gold loop and bead closure.

•	Gloves – Full length white tricot gloves.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Barbie FASHION LUNCHEON Reproduction
description:
Variation REPRODUCTION  of one of Barbie's early outfits called Fashion Luncheon from 1966-1967.   This 3 piece outfit is expertly crafted from the finest fabrics with much attention to detail.   From a retro cotton print and dusty pink glazed cotton.

Dress - v back, fitted bodice lined in tulle.  Slim straight skirt. Snap closures in the back

JACKET - fully lined with a wide collar and jabot.  Snap closure and a "diamond" pin on jabot.  Hand finished with an exclusive Martha's Miniature Workshop tag.

HAT - rolled brim gathered to crown.  Inner headband to hold hat in place.  Trimmed with flowers.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Kitty Kapers - Reproduction
description:
Kitty Kapers Reproduction with extras
5 Pieces

REPRODUCTION of Barbie's Kitty Kapers outfit from 1972.   
 
Made from 3 cotton prints in yellow, blue and orange with white polka dots.  

SKIRT - 3 tiered skirt.  Elastic waist.  Trimmed with white rik-rak.  Attached white flowers.

JACKET -   long sleeve with snap closure with clear button in the front.   Trimmed with white rik-rak. 

SHORTS -  very short hot pants.  Trimmed with white rik-rak.  Snap closure in the back.

BRA TOP - like a bathing suit top.  Finished with tulle.  Gathered at bustline.  Snap closure in the back.  

HAT - very wide floppy brim with attached flower.  

See other Products for another outfit matching this one.

Go to Contact page to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Barbie Glimmer Glamour - Reproduction in Fushia
description:
Vintage Reproduction of one of Barbie's most elusive outfits from 1968.  This 2 piece outfit is expertly crafted from the finest fabrics with much attention to detail.

Dress  - in fuchsia satin with glitter dot chiffon overlay.  Satin bodice has 2 darts in the front and 2 in the back.  Bodice overlay of glitter dot chiffon is trimmed with gold braid.  Neckline and armholes are finished with tulle.    Slim satin skirt with with very full, gathered top skirt in glitter dot chiffon.  

Coat - trapeze style in gold lame with bright yellow taffeta lining.  Ties at the neck.  Hand finished with an exclusive Martha's Miniature Workshop tag.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: WILD THING Reproduction
description:
Wild Thing
3 Piece Reproduction - Jumpsuit, Vest and Belt

REPRODUCTION of one of Barbie's vintage mod outfits called Wild Thing from 1971-1972.  Outfit only.

Bright green turtleneck JUMPSUIT in a ribbed cotton knit.  Long sleeved turtleneck with snap closure in the back.

Long VEST in white acrylic fur with green taffeta lining.  Three bands of floral jacquard trim.  Hand finished with an exclusive Martha's Miniature Workshop tag.

BELT in royal blue textured vinyl.  Gold button in the back.

Go to Contact page to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Bolero Suit with Hat Japan Reproduction
description:
Japan Reproduction
Black Bolero Suit with Hat 
Reproduction 
                               for Francie, Casey and Twiggy

Reproduction of an outfit created exclusively for the Japanese market in the 1960s.   Classic styling as seen on page 92 in the wonderful and not to be missed book:  Barbie in Japan by Keiko Kimura Shibano. 

Three wonderful pieces:

DRESS – Dark, deep black luxurious velvet skirt with a cream satin bodice.  Bodice fitted with darts and finished in tulle.  Snap closures in the back

JACKET - matching black velvet.  Lined with black taffeta and trimmed all around with white guipure trim.   With an exclusive Martha's Miniature Workshop tag.

HAT- matching velvet.  Trimmed with a satin cream flower.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Retro Sport Suit in Leopard and Velvet
description:
3 Piece outfit For Vintage Ken or Allan

OOAK Martha’s Miniature Workshop Original

Sport Jacket - Trousers - Dickey

Sport Jacket - in leopard print cotton.  Pocket flaps.  Button with snap closure.  With an exclusive Martha’s Miniature Workshop tag.

Trousers – in chocolate brown cotton velvet.  Snap closure in the front.

Dickey – in cream cotton.  Snaps behind neck.  Applied yellow satin tie.

Go to Contact page to request more photos.

Doll not included.
 

Doll not Included

name: Barbie - OOAK - Creation in Silk
description:
One of a Kind creation for Barbie from Martha's Miniature Workshop.  

Created entirely from luxury range silks.

DRESS - elegant ball gown.   Asymmetrical, wrapped bodice is done in a dusty pink silk and trimmed with "pearls".   Full, wide floor length skirt is done in cream silk with silk ribbon, floral embroidery.  Wide pink ruffle at hemline in front.   Wide pink bow in back.  Snap closures in the back.  Hand finished with an exclusive Martha's Miniature Workshop tag.

SHAWL is done in a silk netting with silk ribbon floral embroidery.  Finished with tulle.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Sleeping Pretty Reproduction in Black Chiffon
description:
REPRODUCTION in black chiffon of one of Barbie's outfits called Sleeping Pretty from 1965.  Outfit only!

2 pieces:

Peignoir/Robe- 
Full length in black nylon chiffon.  Full puff sleeves below elbow length with lace trim.  Lined  bodice with hand applied cut lace flowers.  Pearl buttons with hand done thread loop closures.  Ties at waist with black satin ribbon.  Hand finished with an exclusive Martha's Miniature Workshop tag.

Gown 
Full length in matching black chiffon.  Bodice is trimmed with same cut lace flowers.  Snap closures in the back with pearl buttons.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Barbie Kitty Kapers Inspired Outfit
description:
One of a Kind, 2 piece outfit inspired by Barbie's Kitty Kapers outfit from 1972.  Made from 3 cotton fabrics of white polka dots on yellow, blue and orange.

DRESS - fitted bodice with shoulder straps, gathered narrow skirt with bottom ruffle.  Snap closures in the back.  Applied white flower.

HAT - wide brimmed floppy hat with orange brim and blue crown.  Crown is trimmed with applied white flowers.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: FRANCIE  OOAK  "Mod Elegance"
description:
One of a Kind creation for Francie from Martha's Miniature Workshop.

Vintage Francie styling (like Miss Teenage Beauty from 1967) in a mod interpretation.

SKIRT is full length with a wide ruffle at botton.  Blue satin underskirt with a overlay of aqua chiffon, randomly sprinkled with metallic gold dots.  Snap closure in the back.  Hand finished with an exclusive Martha's Miniature Workshop tag.

Sleeveless BLOUSE is done in a paisley rayon crepe.  Design is centered in front and back.  Snap closures in the back.  

SHAWL is done in a hot pink plush.  

Full length gloves are done in a pale pink.  

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Barbie - OOAK - Peach Chiffon
description:
One of a Kind creation for Barbie from Martha's Miniature Workshop.  Also fits Silkstone Barbie.

Created from:

Peach Crepe
Peach Chiffon with white flocked dots
Silk Floral Ribbon trim

Vintage style, one shoulder, slim fitting DRESS in peach crepe.  Full, overskirt and wide ruffle at neckline done in flocked peach chiffon.  Skirt and neckline are trimmed with silk floral ribbon.  Snap closures in the back.  Hand finished with an exclusive Martha's Miniature Workshop tag.

Very wide brimmed HAT with crown in peach crepe and gathered brim in flocked peach chiffon.  Trimmed with silk floral ribbon.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Tiny Betsy McCall Coed Outfit Reproduction
description:
Tiny Betsy McCall 
                            Co-ed 
                                        Reproduction and Color Variation

This 3 piece outfit was created for Tiny Betsy McCall and other similar 8" dolls.  Fits American Character Tiny Betsy McCall,  Robert Tonner Tiny Betsy McCall and other dolls like Penny Brite.  

Includes the following three pieces:

DRESS – short sleeved dress with pleated skirt.  Bodice is done in a yellow polka dot cotton with white cotton bias finishing trim around neckline and sleeves.  Long pleated white cotton skirt.  Snap closure in the back.
JACKET - waist length jacket in bright apple green felt.  Top stitched with 4 yellow buttons on the front.  With an exclusive Martha’s Miniature Workshop tag.
HAT - beret style hat in matching felt with felt flower and pearl accent. 

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: TAMMY  Barbie's Shimmering Magic for TAMMY
description:
One of a Kind creation for the vintage Tammy doll by Ideal.

Barbie's classic outfit called Shimmering Magic from 1966-1967 is created here for Tammy by Martha's Miniature Workshop.

Fitted DRESS in silver lame knit.  Snap closure in the back.

Red satin COAT with dropped waist and gathered skirt.  Bodice is lined and skirt is finished with tulle. Hand finished with an exclusive Martha's Miniature Workshop tag.

Wide brimmed HAT in white organdy.  Layers of gathered silver tulle on brim.  Finished with 6 red satin roses.

Go to CONTACT page for questions or to request more photos.

Doll not Included.

name: Barbie and Skipper Matching Outfits
description:
Matching outfits for sisters:  Barbie and Skipper

SKIRT - all around pleats in a cotton plaid.   Applied waistband with snap closure in the back.

BLOUSE -  short sleeved button up with collar.  Snap closure in the front with button.

A skirt and blouse for Barbie and matching set for Skipper.

Go to Contact page to request more photos.

Dolls not Included.
